Rulings.Edison:
●“Evil Blast” targets the monster that you equip it to.
●You can't activate “Evil Blast” during the Damage Step.
●When “Evil Blast” is equipped to a monster, you can switch it to a different monster with “Tailor of the Fickle.”
●The effect that deals damage starts a Chain.
●You can activate “Evil Blast” even if multiple monsters are Special Summoned at the same time.

Rulings.Base:
1. "Evil Blast" targets the monster that you equip it to.
2. You cannot activate "Evil Blast" during the Damage Step.
3. When "Evil Blast" is equipped to a monster, you can switch it to a different monster with "Tailor of the Fickle".
4. The effect that deals damage starts a Chain.
5. You can activate "Evil Blast" even if multiple monsters are Special Summoned at the same time.
